verbose_text: When we compare the coordination numbers of water n OW in the Lyz-Tr (aq) and in the Lyz (aq) systems, we see that the presence of the trehalose in the vicinity of the lysozyme lowers the number of water molecules in the Lyz-Tr (aq) system.
evidence: trehalose in the vicinity of the lysozyme lowers the number of water
